price: Deε yεreka ara nesε,:”Y’abosom no bi de biribi bͻne bi ayε wo“. (Huud) kaa sε: “Mefrε Nyankopͻn sε, oni adanseε (ma me) na monso moni adanseε sε, medeε menka mo mmataho no a -,
arabic: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعۡتَرَىٰكَ بَعۡضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٖۗ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُشۡهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشۡهَدُوٓاْ أَنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in naqūlu illā iʿ'tarāka baʿḍu ālihatinā bisūin qāla innī ush'hidu al-laha wa-ish'hadū annī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
